column1: Are you a resident of the City of Los Angeles?
column3: 1.  Does the City have a need for faster broadband speeds (up to 1Gbps)?
column5: 2.  Is there a need for a free level of broadband (even if only 1-2Mbps)?
column7: 3.  Would you Pay $75/month for a 1Gbps broadband connection?
column9: 4.  If free WiFi were limited to 1-2Mbps, would you use it?
column11: 5.  Would you switch your internet service provider if you found a higher speed service for less money per month?
column13: 6.  Do you think the City should go out to bid to see if there is a vendor that can deliver this project for the City of Los Angeles?
